segments.text: Onxiu Travel Agency , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'd like to make a plane reservation to Shanghai , China .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Via Kiang . I'd like to leave on May 5th .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see what's available . Yes , Air China has a flight on May 5th at nine fifteen in the morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I need an economy ticket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Economy fare for single ticket from Beijing to Shanghai is 500 yuan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Is my ticket confirmed then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , your seat is confirmed on that flight . Pls arrive at the airport one hour before departure .
segments.speaker: S1
